fastapi_shared_intro: FastAPI is a modern, fast web framework for building APIs with Python 3.7+ based on standard Python type hints.
fastapi_shared_installation: Install FastAPI with: pip install fastapi[all]
fastapi_shared_quickstart: Create a simple API with: from fastapi import FastAPI; app = FastAPI()
